parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID for the column element. Must be unique.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The label for the column header.

parameters.name: tooltip
parameters.description: The on-hover tooltip for the column header.

parameters.name: headerName
parameters.description: The name of the header to retrieve.

parameters.name: isNumeric
parameters.description: True if the header should be sorted numerically.
